Class LimitedCounter

java.lang.Object
  Counter
      LimitedCounter

public class LimitedCounter
extends Counter

This class implements a up-counter that counts between a minimum value and a maximum value, inclusive. It must be reset to the minimum value once it reaches its maximimum value.

Version:
1.00 Feb. 14, 2012, 1.01 Feb. 15, 2012
Author:
D.L. Bailey, SCE, Carleton University

Constructor Summary
LimitedCounter()
          Constructs a new LimitedCounter whose current count is initialized to Counter.DEFAULT_MINIMUM, and which counts between Counter.DEFAULT_MINIMUM and Counter.DEFAULT_MAXIMUM, inclusive.
LimitedCounter(int minCount, int maxCount)
          Constructs a new LimitedCounter whose current count is initialized to minCount, and which counts between minCount and maxCount, inclusive.
 
Method Summary
 void countUp()
          Increments this counter by 1.
